name: "Supergirl" Season 2 Episode 13 Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which new character appeared in the opening of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Mxyzptlk

	he scene started at the very end of the previous episode, and continued into this one. He appeared in her window and declared his love for her. He sent Mon-El away when he tried interrupt the courtship Mxyzptlk had planned. He was played by Peter Gadiot.

questions.text: The show continued to play up to holidays in this episode. Which one was being celebrated?
questions.explanation:
Valentine's Day.

	Kara and Mon-El were on a date in the opening scene, but it wasn't mentioned. A few minutes later in the DEO headquarters Mon-El asked her what the day was all about. Alex got a card from her mom to celebrate.

questions.text: Who got in a bar fight at the alien bar?
questions.explanation:
Wynn.

	An alien attempted to beat him up, but before he could finish an alien woman from Starhaven butted in and saved Winn from a beating. She insisted that they have dinner together for Valentine's Day. Her name was Lyra.

questions.text: Who appeared in a fake Superman costume?
questions.explanation:
Mxyzptlk.

	He was wearing a suit just like Superman and Supergirl, but it had an "M" instead of an "S" on the chest. He created the problem that caused her to need help, and then flew in to help her fight the monster.

questions.text: Mon-El was jealous of Kara's new suitor.
questions.explanation:
True.

	They argued over the "double standard" that Kara had in dealing with Mon-El and Mxyzptlk. He was upset that the imp could snap his fingers and fill her apartment with flowers and Mon-El himself couldn't.

questions.text: Who stole an alien weapon from the DEO?
questions.explanation:
Mon-El.

	He spoke with Winn about the weapons the DEO had. Neither of them had any idea what it would do to the 5th dimensional being, but the weapon had a similar energy reading to him. Mon-El took it from the room when Winn left.

questions.text: Did Supergirl agree to marry another character?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	She agreed to marry Mxyzptlk, like he had wanted all along. She told him to meet her at the Fortress of Solitude the next day and she would wear her mother's dress. It was all part of her plan to get rid of him. She saved Mon-El's life by agreeing to the marriage when she did. Of course she never went through with the wedding.

questions.text: What was the code to shut down the detonation at the Fortress of Solitude?
options: A series of Kryptonian symbols that have no meaning on Earth.
questions.explanation:
Mxyzptlk's name backwards.

	Supergirl learned from Hank earlier in the episode that "on some planets to write something down is to truly say it". She was unable to get him to speak his name backwards, so she used a foreign language to spell it backwards and got him to enter the code.

questions.text: Who got upset and walked out of their significant other?
questions.explanation:
Maggie.

	Maggie had told Alex earlier in the episode that she hated Valentine's Day, but not why. Alex tried to set up a special Valentine's Day evening, to which Maggie got upset and stormed out. Later in the episode Maggie set up a special evening for the two of them to make amends.

questions.text: Which of the following characters didn't have a significant other appear in the episode?
questions.explanation:
Hank.

	He spoke about Megan, but she did not appear. She had left Earth to return to Mars in an earlier episode.
